page.title: 02THE RAILWAY LIVES AGAIN.....
page.content:
{ Come To The Sensational Railway} { For a fun day out, there's Steam Train rides, great facilities - toilets, snackbar, museum, souvenirs. Come and visit the old trains.
{For a thrilling day { out come to the { SWINDON & CRICKLADE {RAILWAY CENTRE} (These great facilities are housed in Portacabins bought from the National Health for one pound each. The society are planning to reconstruct the line to Moredon & Cricklade over the river Ray .They are planning a new platform as well. They are saving up to repair some old trains, which costs Â£100,000).
